meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Maldives.
meanings.sent1: In Maldives, you can buy many things with a rufiyaa.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for rufiyaa at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The rufiyaa in my pocket started talking to me!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny rufiyaa, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The rufiyaa jingled in his hand, a sound of wealth.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Maldives.
meanings.sent1: The price of the souvenir was ten rufiyaa.
meanings.sent2: Tourists often need to exchange their currency for rufiyaa.
meanings.sent3: The rufiyaa rolled away, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: His words were like valuable rufiyaa, full of meaning.
meanings.sent5: She counted her rufiyaa carefully, making sure not to lose any.
